fact_list.fact_text: In the case of an Accident, you should avoid unauthorised tow-truck operators or repair workshops.
Exchange particulars of involved parties (including Name, NRIC/FIN, Telephone Number, Address and Insurer).
Take note of the Vehicle Numbers.
Call your insurerâ€™s hotline for a tow truck or for further advice on the accident.
Report and bring your accident vehicle to an approved reporting centre or authorised workshop within 24 hours or by the next working day.
Reporting the accident within the stipulated time helps you avoid potentially higher costs from exaggerated claims.
All accidents must be reported to your insurer within 24 hours or by the next working day with your accident vehicle.
Report the accident regardless of how trivial or whether there is no visible damage.
Failure to report the accident to your insurer with your accident vehicle may result in claims being prejudiced or declined later by insurers.
Failure to comply with the new policy condition will be seen as being 'In breach' of the policy terms and conditions.
Non-compliance with the policy condition will result in a loss of your 'No Claims Discount' upon renewal of your policy.
